fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of person in role, or 'N/D' if the role is not currently filled.

fields.name: Grade (or equivalent)
fields.description: Grade of role. Grades for senior civil servants are overseen by the Cabinet Office centrally.

fields.name: Parent Department
fields.description: Name of the central government department that oversees the organisation (or if the organisation is a department, just name it again here).

fields.name: Organisation
fields.description: The department or agency for whom the role is for.

fields.name: Unit
fields.description: Where the organisation's staff are split into functional units (or teams/sections etc), give the name of the unit.

constraints.description: The 'post unique reference' of the post that this one reports to. The most senior post should put 'xx'.

fields.name: FTE
fields.description: Full Time Equivalent. If this is a full time role then put '1'. Otherwise put a decimal fraction.

fields.name: Actual Pay Floor (£)
fields.description: The annual pay, rounded down to the nearest multiple of £5,000.

fields.name: Actual Pay Ceiling (£)
fields.description: The annual pay, rounded up to the nearest multiple of £5,000 minus 1.
